channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 05:46 Air alert in Rivne region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 05:46 Air alert in Rivne region. Follow further messages. #Rivne_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:28 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
